person.persName: Blount Hodge (Livingston County, KY, farmer and trader)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer and trader. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Eliza Phillips Hodge in Livingston County, Kentucky, on December 9, 1823. Married to Elizabeth P. Brigham Hodge in Livingston County on October 22, 1834. Father of Gus Hodge, James C. Hodge and Blount Hodge. Resident in Livingston County in 1830. Owned six enslaved persons in Livingston County in 1830. Resident in Livingston County in 1840. Owned five enslaved persons in Livingston County in 1840. Trader in Livingston County in 1850. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Livingston County in 1850. Farmer in Livingston County in 1860. Owned twenty-six enslaved persons in Livingston County in 1860.
